newsitem.title: FRANCE: SOCCER-MARSEILLE MAKE CONTACT WITH GINOLA.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-MARSEILLE MAKE CONTACT WITH GINOLA.

text.p: Marseille have been in contact with Newcastle United's unsettled French winger David Ginola, sources close to the former European champions said on Wednesday.
They said Marseille sporting director Marcel Dib has had talks with Ginola's personal manager Jean-Francois Larios about a possible transfer.

Ginola, unable to command a regular first team place under new manager Kenny Dalglish's regime at Newcastle, has expressed interest in moving to Marseille, his wife's home town and close to his home of Sanary in the neighbouring department of Var.
Marseille striker Xavier Gravelaine, a former French national team mate of Ginola, has been approached by Valencia. But Marseille said they had not been contacted by the Spanish club.
